revised_title: Advances in Heavy Electrical Plant: Mechanical and Aerodynamic Problems Associated with Future Overhead Lines
tldr: This article discusses recent advancements in heavy electrical plant, focusing on mechanical and aerodynamic problems associated with future overhead power lines. It covers aeolian vibration, subspan oscillation, and full span galloping, as well as the use of vibration dampers to control these issues. The authors explore solutions to these problems and their potential impact on future overhead line designs.
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Electrical Power Systems
